title: Build “geode+” Geode-like mod discovery web app for Geometry Dash

requirements.text: Create a web application named “geode+” that provides a Geode-like experience for Geometry Dash focused on mod discovery and management metadata (not modifying the Geometry Dash game client): users can browse a catalog of mods, view mod details, and save mods to a personal library.

quotes: Make me a app that is geode for geometry dash but you can get it on the App Store and it’s called geode+

acceptanceCriteria: App name “geode+” is visible in the UI (header/title/metadata).
Users can browse a list of mods and open a mod details view.
Users can add/remove a mod from their personal library (requires sign-in).
No functionality attempts to patch, inject into, or directly modify Geometry Dash binaries.

requirements.text: Implement Internet Identity authentication so each user can maintain a private, persistent “My Library” list of saved mods.

quotes: Make me a app that is geode for geometry dash... called geode+

acceptanceCriteria: Users can sign in and sign out with Internet Identity.
After signing in, users can add/remove mods to/from “My Library.”
A user’s library persists across reloads and is isolated from other users.

requirements.text: Backend: add Motoko data models and API methods to store and query mod catalog entries (public) and user library entries (per-user). Include basic fields: id/slug, name, author, version, short description, long description, tags, and optional external links.

quotes: Make me a app... like geode for geometry dash... called geode+

acceptanceCriteria: Backend exposes query methods to list mods and fetch a mod by id/slug.
Backend exposes authenticated methods to add/remove/list a user’s saved mods.
Mod ids are stable and user library references remain valid for existing mods.

requirements.text: Frontend: build core pages/components: (1) Home/Explore (mod list with search and tag filtering), (2) Mod Details (full information + save/unsave button), (3) My Library (saved mods list), and (4) About/Disclaimer page clarifying this is an independent companion app and not affiliated with Geometry Dash or Geode.

quotes: Make me a app that is geode for geometry dash... called geode+

acceptanceCriteria: Explore page supports text search and tag filtering on the mod catalog.
Mod Details shows all mod fields and a clear save/unsave control.
My Library shows only the signed-in user’s saved mods.
About/Disclaimer page is accessible from navigation and uses English text.

requirements.text: Provide an initial curated set of sample mods seeded in the backend so the app is usable immediately after deployment (seed data can be stored in-code).
acceptanceCriteria: A fresh deploy shows a non-empty mod catalog without requiring an admin UI.
At least 8 sample mods exist with varied tags and descriptions.

requirements.text: Apply a coherent, distinct visual theme for “geode+” across the UI (colors, typography, spacing, and components). Use a modern “arcade terminal” aesthetic with dark charcoal backgrounds and lime/green accents (avoid a blue/purple primary palette).
acceptanceCriteria: Theme is consistent across all pages (navigation, cards, buttons, inputs).
Primary accents are lime/green on a dark charcoal base (not blue/purple primary).
UI remains readable with sufficient contrast.

requirements.text: Add and display generated static image assets: an app logo and a hero/banner illustration in the frontend, stored under frontend/public/assets/generated, and used on the Home page and/or header.
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images exist in frontend/public/assets/generated and are referenced directly by the frontend (no backend image serving).
Logo is visible in the header/nav area.
Hero/banner image is visible on the Explore/Home page.

constraints: Do not claim App Store availability or implement App Store submission workflows (the delivered app is a web app on the Internet Computer).
Do not implement or describe functionality that patches, injects into, or modifies the Geometry Dash game client.
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo (no additional backend services).
Do not edit any frontend files under frontend/src/components/ui or other immutablePaths; compose them instead.
nonGoals: Direct integration with Geometry Dash process memory, files, or binaries.
Third-party authentication providers other than Internet Identity.

required: App logo mark, neon lime on dark charcoal, simple geometric/glyph style (geodeplus-logo.dim_512x512.png)
Wide hero banner with abstract geometric shards/crystals, dark charcoal background with lime highlights (geodeplus-hero.dim_1600x900.png)
